SharedAccessSignatureAuthorizationRule.description: Contains properties that describe the keys to access the IotHub artifacts.

keyName.description: Gets or sets the name of the key.

primaryKey.description: Gets or sets the primary key.

secondaryKey.description: Gets or sets the secondary key.

rights.description: Gets or sets the access rights.

IotHubProperties.description: Contains user facing view of Iot Hub properties

authorizationPolicies.description: Gets or sets the authorization rules.

hostName.description: Gets the name of the host.

storageEndpoints.description: List of storage end points where files can be uploaded. Currently only one storage account can be configured.

messagingEndpoints.description: List of messaging end points configured.

enableFileUploadNotifications.description: File upload notification is optional at iot hub level. When enabled upload notifications will be available.

cloudToDevice.description: Gets the cloud to device properties.

operationsMonitoringProperties.description: Gets or sets the operations monitoring properties.

features.description: Gets or sets the Capabilities/Features that need to be enabled for the Hub.

IotHubSkuInfo.description: Class IotHubSkuInfo. Contains the Sku related information for the hub.

name.description: Gets or sets the name of the Sku.

capacity.description: The number of units being provisioned.

EventHubProperties.description: Contains the user facing view of the properties of the provisioned event hub used by the Iot Hub

retentionTimeInDays.description: Gets or sets the retention time in days.

partitionCount.description: Gets or sets the partition count.

partitionIds.description: Gets or sets the partition ids.

internalAuthorizationPolicies.description: Gets or sets the internal authorization rules.

authorizationPolicies.description: Gets or sets the authorization rules.

StorageEndpointProperties.description: Contains the user facing view of the properties of the Storage Endpoint provided by the customer for file upload

connectionString.description: Account key credentials for storage account selected by customer for uploading files

containerName.description: Root container name where all files will be uploaded

MessagingEndpointProperties.description: Contains the user facing view of the properties of the Messaging Endpoints used by this IoT Hub

CloudToDeviceProperties.description: Contains user facing view of Iot Hub Cloud-To-Device messaging properties

OperationsMonitoringProperties.description: Contains the user facing view of the Operation Monitoring properties

FeedbackProperties.description: Contains user facing view of Iot Hub Feedback Queue properties

IotHubDescription.description: Contains user facing view of the Description of the IotHub

name.description: The name of the Iot Hub

type.description: The type of the resource. It should include the resource provider namespace *and* the type of the entity. Microsoft.Devices/IotHubs.

location.description: The location of the resource. This would be one amongst the supported Azure Geo Regions registered by the RP: West US | East US | North Central US | South Central US | West Europe | North Europe | East Asia | Southeast Asia | East US 2 | etc.

tags.description: A list of key value pairs that describe the resource. These tags can be used in viewing and grouping this resource (across resource groups). A maximum of 15 tags can be provided for a resource, and each tag must have a key no greater than 512 characters (and value no greater than 256 characters).

resourcegroup.description: The resource group name uniquely identifies the resource group within the user subscriptionId. The resource group name must be no longer than 80 characters long, and must be alphanumeric characters (Char.IsLetterOrDigit()) and ‘-‘, ‘_’, ‘(‘, ‘)’ and‘.’. Note that the name cannot end with ‘.’

etag.description: The Etag field is *not* required. If it is provided in the response body, it must also be provided as a header per the normal ETag convention.

properties.description: Property bag contains other name/value pairs that can be used for telemetry and logging.

sku.description: The sku. Sku Name - [F1 | S1 | S2 | ...] : Tier - ["Free" for F1 | "Standard" for S1, S2, ...] : Provisioned Units - Refer to the detailed product documentation for exact range of values

value.description: Gets or sets the list of

ResourceProviderOperationDisplayInfo.description: Contains properties related to the RP Operation Display Info.

ResourceProviderOperationProperties.description: Contains properties describing the Resource provider Operations.

serviceSpecification.description: Gets or sets the service specification.

ServiceSpecification.description: Contains properties related to a service specification.

metricSpecifications.description: Gets or sets the metric specifications.

logSpecifications.description: Gets or sets the log specifications.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name.

displayDescription.description: Gets or sets the display description.

aggregationType.description: Gets or sets the type of the aggregation.

dimensions.description: Gets or sets the metric dimensions.

availabilities.description: Gets or sets the metric availabilities.

LogSpecification.description: Contains properties related to a log specification.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name.

blobDuration.description: Gets or sets the duration of the BLOB.

displayName.description: Gets or sets the display name.

MetricAvailability.description: Contains properties related to a Metric Availability.

timeGrain.description: Gets or sets the time grain.

blobDuration.description: Gets or sets the duration of the BLOB.

ErrorDetails.description: Contains properties related to the details of an error.

value.description: Gets or sets the list of

AsyncOperationResult.description: Contains properties related to the status of a long running operation.

ErrorMesssage.description: Contains properties relates to an error message.

RegistryStatistics.description: Contains the properties related to the registry statistics of an IotHub.

totalDeviceCount.description: Gets or sets the total device count.

enabledDeviceCount.description: Gets or sets the enabled device count.

disabledDeviceCount.description: Gets or sets the disabled device count.

value.description: Gets or sets the list of

IotHubSkuDescription.description: Contains properties related to the Iot Hub Sku.

resourceType.description: Gets the type of the resource.

IotHubCapacity.description: Contains the properties related to the IotHub capacity information.

minimum.description: Gets or sets the minimum number of units.

maximum.description: Gets or sets the maximum number of units.

default.description: Gets or sets the default number of units.

scaleType.description: Gets or sets the type of the scale.

StringListResult.description: Contains the user view of a List Result with a next link

value.description: Gets or sets the list of

EventHubConsumerGroupInfo.description: Contains user facing properties indicating the EventHubConsumerGroupInfo.

IotHubSkuDescriptionListResult.description: Contains the user view of a List Result with a next link

value.description: Gets or sets the list of

JobResponse.description: Contains user facing properties describing a Job Response

startTimeUtc.description: Service generated. Start time of the Job.

endTimeUtc.description: Service generated. Represents the time the job stopped processing.

type.description: The type of job to execute.

status.description: Service generated. Status of the Job.

failureReason.description: Service generated. If status == failure, this represents a string containing the reason.

deviceId.description: The deviceId related to this response.

parentJobId.description: The jobId of the parent job, if any.

IotHubDescriptionListResult.description: Contains the user view of a List Result with a next link

value.description: Gets or sets the list of

IotHubQuotaMetricInfo.description: Contains properties related to quota metrics for an Iot Hub.

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of the quota metric.

CurrentValue.description: Gets or sets the current value for the quota metric.

MaxValue.description: Gets or sets the maximum value of the quota metric.

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of the iot hub.

ResourceType.description: Gets or sets the type of the resource.

TokenLifeTimeInMinutes.description: Gets or sets the token life time in minutes.

ConnectionString.description: Gets or sets the connection string.

IotHubDescription.description: Gets or sets the iot hub description.

IotHubNameAvailabilityInfo.description: Contains the user view of properties indicating whether a given iothub name is available

nameAvailable.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the provided name is available.

reason.description: Gets or sets the reason for unavailability.

ResourceProviderOperationInfoListResult.description: Contains the user view of a List Result with a next link

value.description: Gets or sets the list of

ExportDevicesRequest.description: Used to provide parameters when requesting an export of all devices in the hub.

ExportBlobContainerUri.description: Gets or sets the export BLOB container URI.

ExcludeKeys.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether keys should be excluded during export.

ImportDevicesRequest.description: Used to provide parameters when requesting an import of all devices in the hub.

InputBlobContainerUri.description: Gets or sets the input BLOB container URI.

OutputBlobContainerUri.description: Gets or sets the output BLOB container URI.
